messages: I messed up.
Jubn, jung'f tbvat ba?!

I was supposed to be watching the sheep,
but I took a quick nap, and the next thing
I know... they were all over the place.

How did they get out? The fence looks
fine.

I don't even know. Maybe they were, you
know, hacked out. By the Big Bad.

But the Big Bad hasn't been around for
years. Just how long was this nap?

It was the shortest nap. Super quick. It
was a long blink, really.
A super, tiny, microscopic nap.

I really need this job, man. My last trip
to Pigeon-Con, I spent all my rent money
on merch.

Can you just help me out? Get them back
inside somehow?

Can you help a dude out? Put all four
sheep back inside the fence?
Awesome! Don't stop, now!
Thanks a million! I owe you one!

Oh, wow, are the sheep actually back
inside the pen? I could've sworn they....

Hey, did you do that? Did you put them
back?

Wow, thanks a lot! I could've gotten
into deep trouble!
Return sheep to pen?
All sheep returned.
Helga remains.
Nothing changed.
